actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of increasing the amount of payments made in lieu of taxes by public housing agencies.

summary.text: Increases the amount of payments made in lieu of taxes by public housing agencies from 10 to 15 percent, under the United States Housing Act of 1937.

titles.title: A bill to amend the U.S. Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of increasing the amount of payments made in lieu of taxes by public housing agencies.
